text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-aldosterone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-betamethasone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-cloprednol
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-cortisone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-cortivazol
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-deflazacort
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-desoxycorticosterone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-dexamethasone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-fludrocortisone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-fluocortolone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-hydrocortisone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-meprednisone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-methylprednisolone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-paramethasone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-prednisolone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-prednisone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-prednylidene
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-rimexolone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-triamcinolone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-trilostane

name: Valueset_SCS
title: Systemic Corticosteroid Drug Value Set
description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC1-4) Corticosteroids For Systemic Use drug class (id: H02).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
purpose: Provide Systemic Corticosteroids drug class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
